caption: Two men are smoking in a room. The man with glasses picks up his mobile phone and starts dialing. He makes a call, and then the man with glasses takes out a briefcase and puts documents inside it. Afterward, he turns and leaves. Inside an office building, many people are working at their desks. They are typing on computers and making various phone calls. Several people are having lunch. In one room, many people are in a meeting. One person goes to the balcony to answer a phone call, and another man in black follows. On the other end of the phone, there's someone in a car. These people return to their computers and put on headphones. In a dimly lit room, several people are gathered.
